text: Knock it down! is a 1991 Hungarian comedy movie directed by Péter Tímár and starring Pap Vera, Sándor Gáspár, Károly Eperjas, Eszenyi Enikő, Róbert Koltai, Mari Töröcsik, Jenő Kiss. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Movies directed by Péter Tímár
title: Knock it down!
